name.ja: <ruby>炎<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby><ruby>獣<rt>じゅう</rt></ruby>ハヌマーン

text.en: If a face-up "Fire King" monster(s) you control is destroyed by card effect: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. When a Spell/Trap Card or effect is activated while this monster is on the field (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy 1 other FIRE monster in your hand or face-up field. You can only use each effect of "Fire King Avatar Hanuman" once per turn.

ja.set_name: Structure Deck R: Onslaught of the Fire Kings
